name: project 3.1
description:
updated project 3a

- have a different win outcome (if a timer ends, and you hit the lantern, you should win) 

- have the snow and background spawn so its not limited

- characters slow after hitting enemies

- characters slow after a long amount of play time

- have the lantern visually change the area (have an area turn white for a limited time)

- no one responded dialog

- bad end: hit by 9+ enemies, or playing for too long, snow will get heavier and characters will slow until the game quits
